title: Social media growth tips marketing site (single-page landing)

requirements.summary: Build a responsive, multi-section single-page marketing site with clear top navigation and scannable content for social media growth.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page loads without errors and is readable on mobile and desktop.
Site includes a top navigation and at least these sections: Hero/intro, Core growth tips, Platform-specific tips, Tools & resources, FAQ.
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Create the root landing page layout with top navigation and required sections (Hero/intro, Core growth tips, Platform-specific tips, Tools & resources, FAQ). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card, Accordion, Tabs, Separator) to structure scannable content. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a responsive top navigation (desktop links + mobile-friendly menu) that scrolls to section anchors. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Sheet/DropdownMenu) for accessible navigation patterns. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated section for platform-specific tips with concise, scannable blocks (e.g., Instagram/TikTok/YouTube/LinkedIn/X). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Tabs + Card) for organized navigation within the section. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a tools/resources section with curated categories (content planning, design, analytics learning, posting checklists) and safe outbound links (no integrations). Use shadcn-ui Card/Badge components for scannable resource tiles. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create an FAQ section with common questions and short answers. Use shadcn-ui Accordion for accessible expand/collapse behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the core growth tips section container that renders the required guidance subsections in a consistent, scannable format. Use shadcn-ui Card/Separator for section styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add practical growth guidance content for the specified topics, including at least one actionable checklist.
acceptanceCriteria: Each listed topic is presented as a distinct subsection with bullet points or short paragraphs.
At least one actionable checklist is included (e.g., "Profile checklist" or "Weekly growth routine").

file_operations.description: Add structured English content covering: profile optimization, content strategy, consistency/scheduling, engagement/community, hashtags/SEO, analytics/iteration, and cross-promotion/collaboration; include at least one actionable checklist (e.g., Profile Checklist + Weekly Growth Routine).

Render each required topic as a distinct subsection using the content model, ensuring bullet points/short paragraphs and prominently displaying the checklist(s). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Badge) for scannability. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make the site shareable via a single public landing route and add a prominent CTA that smoothly scrolls to tips/resources.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the root route displays the landing page content.
Primary CTA button scrolls to the main tips section (or resources) and works on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Ensure the app renders the landing content at the root and defines section anchors/refs (e.g., tips/resources) for scroll targets; keep a single public entry view without requiring authentication.

Create a hero/intro section with a prominent primary CTA button that triggers smooth scrolling to the main tips (or resources) section. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a small utility hook/function to perform reliable smooth scrolling to anchors/refs with optional offset (for sticky nav), working on mobile and desktop.

Wire nav link clicks to smooth scroll behavior and ensure keyboard accessibility for in-page navigation. Use shadcn-ui primitives as needed (e.g., Button) for consistent behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive, non-default visual theme (not blue+purple dominant) with consistent typography, spacing, and component styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent typographic scale (headings/body) and spacing across sections.
Theme avoids a default/unstyled look and is consistent across all pages/sections.
Do not use a blue+purple dominant palette unless explicitly requested later.

file_operations.description: Add global Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables (colors/typography/radius) to establish a cohesive look; choose a palette that is not blue+purple dominant (e.g., warm neutrals with green/orange accents) and define consistent heading/body styles and section spacing.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (if needed) to support the chosen palette, typography, and spacing tokens used across sections, keeping styling consistent and avoiding a default look.
Create a shared layout wrapper (max-width, consistent section padding, background accents) used by App to enforce consistent spacing/typography across all sections.
Wrap the landing page in the shared Layout and ensure each section follows the same typographic scale and spacing conventions.

requirements.summary: Include the required generated static images (hero illustration and icon set) from frontend/public/assets/generated and render them without layout shift.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Images render crisply at common breakpoints without layout shift.

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero illustration asset at the exact required path for static rendering by the frontend.
Add the generated 6-icon set asset at the exact required path for use across sections.

Render the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/social-growth-hero.dim_1600x900.png with explicit width/height or aspect-ratio handling to prevent layout shift; ensure responsive sizing for common breakpoints.

Use the icon set from frontend/public/assets/generated/social-icons-set.dim_512x512.png to visually label the relevant subsections (profile, calendar/consistency, engagement, hashtag/SEO, analytics, collaboration). Ensure icons are displayed in fixed-size containers to avoid layout shift.
Optionally reuse the icon set from frontend/public/assets/generated/social-icons-set.dim_512x512.png for resource category headers; keep consistent sizing and spacing across cards to maintain polish.
